page.title: 04LOCAL NEWS - NEWTOWN
page.content: New Town Primary School has been burgled twice this year and it has been very difficult for some classes in our school to carry on with their work. A video and a computer have been stolen. They nearly broke into the safe and took the money in it but luckily they were caught. Last year some one was raped in Filey Road. She was in her thirties and she was on her own when she was attacked. Last year there was a fire in Amity Street. The house was mostly burnt down but the remains were knocked down then cleared away. It was the home of a boy from our shool called Tanveer.He is a third year junior. Around this area there is a lot of vandalism especially around Cholmeley Place on the garages and walls. It should be banned from Britain.J.Hannah
